articles.author: Khanyiso Tshwaku
articles.title: Langeveldt to leave Proteas men's team while Maketa's future to be debated
articles.description: Cricket South Africa's director of cricket Enoch Nkwe confirmed that bowling coach Charl Langeveldt would not be part of the new Proteas men's team coaching dispensation.
articles.content:
• Cricket South Africa's director of cricket Enoch Nkwe said bowling coach Charl Langeveldt wouldn't be part of the new split-format coaching dispensation.

articles.author: Peter Lusted
articles.title: PNG a rising force in women's cricket as Lewas hone skills in Australia's Country Championships
articles.description: They have overcome monsoon rains, a lack of facilities and an unfair share of domestic chores, but PNG women are still climbing the world Twenty20 rankings.
articles.content:
There's just one turf cricket pitch in Papua New Guinea, but that hasn't stopped the country's women's team rising to 12th in the world Twenty20 rankings.
The Lewas, as the national side are called,… [+2871 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
